description.value:
A Character can be implanted with this mass of heresy with a -30 Medicae Test over the course of several hours. If successful they gain Regeneration(1d5) and The Stuff of Nightmares Traits. If fail, permenantly reduce Toughness Characteristic by 1d5.

Requirements

Once implanted, can never be removed without killing the host. Very Heretical.

Effect: Unique

Notes: -
